title: InkBorn
description: I thought limping through a year at InkHaven as an unprepared, unmagical noob would be the hardest thing I ever did.I was wrong.Returning to InkHaven after a summer spent in domestic bliss is a kick to the teeth, especially when I have to leave two of my men behind to do so. But that’s nothing compared to what the Academy has in store for me in the coming year.Somebody wants me dead, and I’ll have to sacrifice pieces of myself to survive.Disclaimer: Ink Born is a Reverse Harem Paranormal Academy Romance featuring all adult characters. It contains graphic scenes with both m/f and m/m content, as well as frequent group dynamics.
author: Kenna Bardot
